name: Prison Tycoon 3™: Lockdown
description: Crack that Whip! Take reigns of a privately run prison. You are responsible for the care, custody, and control of individuals who have been arrested. Begin with a low security prison and build it up to a SuperMax. From construction to daily operations, you must protect society while turning a profit. It's time for lockdown.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft® Windows® XP/Vista Processor: Pentium® III 1.4 GHz or greater Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 64 MB DirectX® 9 compatible video card (ATI Radeon 8500, Geforce  5200 or Intel GMA 900 series) Sound Card: DirectX 9 compatible sound card Input: Keyboard and mouse
